ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

Class Fragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.FModel
      • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.Fragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Fragment
extends FModel
implements java.io.Serializable
    Saves and returns all the corresponding fragment information upon fragment saving or fragment recall. Will Store the parameters within the fragment and will be unique to that fragment.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
